article_title: Here’s Why There Is A Cybersecurity Crisis in This Country
article_text: Early cloud adopters have learned that implementing SaaS isn’t always as fast or easy as it’s cracked up to be. As companies consider cloud-based ERP solutions, the lessons of early SaaS adopters become all the more important.

twitter.description: Apparently the secret to getting people to spill their Internet password requires a television camera and the promise of a national audience. On Thursday night Jimmy Kimmel Live found every CISO's worst nightmare strolling the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
twitter.title: Here’s Why There Is A Cybersecurity Crisis in This Country

article_summary:
As companies consider cloud-based ERP solutions, the lessons of early SaaS adopters become all the more important.
Early cloud adopters have learned that implementing SaaS isn’t always as fast or easy as it’s cracked up to be.
